storyInfo:
Ch'en and Lin Yühsia decide to join the competition as a team. Elsewhere, Hoshiguma and Swire have come to Dossoles too.
In an arms shop, Ernesto explains to the two the specifics of how the championship runs.

attributes.content: I gotta say, Missy, we've been in this city for days now, and I haven't once seen you up to meet Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: After all that talking about how you'd sneak up on her and scare her lights out.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You want an ice cream?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'll take three scoops. Mint, strawberry, chocolate.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You're gonna get so fat.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: A triple, boss—VANILLA, strawberry, chocolate. And a quadruple, those three plus lemon.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Boss

attributes.content: Who's gonna get fat now?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia went through government channels, nothing like us. You're riding my coattails to get the VIP treatment.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And I gotta say, I think the dummy's still probably on her way here, hahaha!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Vacation won't end any time soon. Let's enjoy the wait.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Shitty rat, sneaking her way into such a nice vacation spot. When I find you, you're done for.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey, Missy. Don't forget what this vacation cost you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's all my annual leave plus a month of one-day weekends after I get back. Isn't that it? It's fine, I'll be fine.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Once you include my vacation days to keep your trouble in check, yeah, that's it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, jeez, I'll pay you back later.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Sure, sure.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Uh?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wha-? Did you see her?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Not just Lin Yühsia. Someone you'd never guess with her.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Who the...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Haah?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Careful with your ice cream! You're gonna drop it! Hey!
attributes.name: Boss

attributes.content: Hah... how the hell did this happen?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Huff... pant... finally found you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Weren't the two of you pursuing them? Why are you here in the Smash Splash now?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If I didn't spot you on the TV back in the streets, I would've missed you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It was an accident.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well, now what? Are you going to team up and enter the championship?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I was going to enter, but not with her.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: There's a coincidence. I was thinking the same thing.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ch'en Hui-chieh, you're free to pick a different prelim.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No can do. This one is the very last one.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I guess it's time to settle who's the bigger woman.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm sorry to have to tell you, half the city is watching through their screens, right now.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You might as well enter together. It'll be good to have each other's backs, too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Alright. I'll help you out.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: After all, I'm your guide. If she heard you joined and I was nowhere around, the Mayor wouldn't let me off easy.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I might not be as strong in a fight as you two, but I'm still a local. I'm sure I can be of assistance.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Will they let us bring a plus-one?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Sure. Team size limit is seven. As long as you complete your registration before the official championship, even finding teammates after winning is fair game.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: To be honest, it's a competition where more teammates net you a greater advantage.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: One more beats one fewer. Any complaints, Lin Yühsia?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We're still two days out from the official start. You're allowed to go recruit more.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No need. We'll go with us three.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Excuse me, er, you two, can I ask you to head up on stage?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Add one more. We're three total now.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Alright, let's give our prelim winners the greatest round of applause!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Have you come up with a name for your team?
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: How do you figure?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You decide.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Then we're calling it... LUNG wRATh. All caps. Except the 'w' and 'h'.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You told me to decide.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Er... alright, then, LUNG wRATh! Now, here to give you your awards for making it out of the prelims, we have Mr. Pancho!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: I see Candela brought us two incredible young ladies.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: You know us?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Who doesn't know how the Mayor welcomed two young Lungmenites?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Ernesto, you've been dutiful with our guests, haven't you?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: It's an undertaking from Ms. Candela herself, Father. Of course I'm doing all I can.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Fine, good.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: This is your father?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Here's your award. Take it.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: A pure gold statue...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You get this sort of award just for beating a prelim?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Yes. Remember where you are. This is the Dossoles way.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: You have your fun, youngsters.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Alright, we're all looking forward to LUNG wRATh's performance in the official championship!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Haaaa ha ha ha ha ha ha haaaaa! Missy, did you hear that? LUNG wRATh, haaaaaa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haaaaaaa!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Laugh a little quieter, I dare you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You have to see the pout on Miss Lin's face. Ch'en totally came up with that name on the spot.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No, forget that! What is Ch'en Hui-chieh doing here too? The nerve of the woman! And they entered together! Did the little rat only even come because she knew Ch'en would be here?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Heh heh heh, you've got guts, Lin Yühsia, keeping all this from me...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey, Missy. Don't get carried away.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You said it was Chief Wei who arranged Lin Yühsia's business here. So it follows that Ch'en's here for the Chief too... right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Fine... I guess you've got a point.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Also... may as well suggest it. Miss Lin's here, and so's Ch'en. Let's go say hi?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph... I have an even better plan.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The two of them teamed up to join the competition, right? Perfect.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The whole championship's going to be broadcast live from start to finish. Let's hold off on saying hello. We'll watch them compete, and then when they lose, we'll go laugh in their faces.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ha, now you hate Ch'en too, on top of everything.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph. She came here on a vacation without so much as a word. Aren't you pissed off?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You know, I'm glad Ch'en's doing well. Words can't express how happy I am for her.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ugh, are we speaking different languages here? Agree with me or not, come on.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm your bodyguard here. Your word is law.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's more like it.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Not my fault if we run across them though, okay?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: We'll cross that bridge when we come to it!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey, look! They're the ones who just won the scrimmage preliminaries, right?
attributes.name: Excited Female Tourist

attributes.content: Keep it up, LUNG wRATh! You've got me on your side already!
attributes.name: Passionate Male Tourist

attributes.content: Well, then, I'll just...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Ernesto, in this city, I've noticed a lot of military personnel.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Your intuition's on the mark. The truth is, not everyone's allowed into Dossoles.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If you want to come vacation here, you need to have enough money. If you want to come live here, you need even more money.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In Bolívar, the second-best way to make money is temp jobs, and the best, most profitable one—is serving.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Was your father a soldier too?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The old man sure used to be. I remember he made full colonel.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's pretty high up.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I guess you want to ask why he'd come here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I admit I'm curious.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: There's nothing much to say. He's majorly stubborn, thinks about nothing but war all day, and doesn't like kissing up to bosses. He got falsely charged, and then driven out of the army.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Save it. I think he's dull enough for a lifetime too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: He doesn't have a big enough fist, and what does he stand up straight all day like that for?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: ...I suppose.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I thought you'd argue back.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I do want to, but ultimately I don't know this place, or really Bolívar as a whole.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I can say the old man's been pretty good since coming here, or I'd have never been able to work under the Mayor.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Come to think of it, the two of you have been in Dossoles for two days now. Any thoughts on the city so far?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Corrupt.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Stinks to high heaven.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It seems we're of a mind, for once.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Now that's funny. I was sure any guests the Mayor invited here would love it.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Me? I love this place, naturally.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You never need to think about the world outside. As long as you have money, you can play, from sun-up to sun-down, and then from sun-down back to sun-up.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I don't know how you live in Lungmen, but I can't imagine there's a better life than here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Is that so.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Forget that for now... Is this whole competition as heavy on full-contact as the scrimmage just now?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ah! Yes.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I don't know if you have anything similar over there, but in this competition, the courses are designed for physical contests.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But of course, the people aren't here for a simple stamina match.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Most everyone is chasing a thrill. What they really want to see is the kind of fight you two put on. Stuff that gets their hearts pumping.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: So in other words, we go out there to amuse the people.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hahaha! You could put it that way.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This is utterly senseless.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm in agreement with you there, but nothing changes the fact that we're taking part. Let's be prepared.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Sorry, Ernesto, but we'll be asking you to explain more about the format of the competition.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: First things first, do you know of a weapons vendor anywhere?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I do. You're in the market?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If the combat holds up like it just did, I might need a change of arms, at the least.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: In that case, come with me. This isn't an open-air kind of topic, anyway.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Come in, please.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You own this shop?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: That's right. It's just the place you're looking for.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I've opened a handful of these stores throughout the city. Call it an income stream.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We carry all sorts of weapons, as a matter of course, but can I ask, why are you looking to change, Miss Ch'en?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: My sword isn't that suited to competitive stuff like this.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Hm... Honestly, the blade you carry doesn't pose any kind of problem.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: There's a mountain of competitors with weapons and tricks a whole lot worse than that up their sleeves. Swords aren't high on the danger scale.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Which is to say: even if you don't use yours, others will use theirs.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. I'm not good with mercy.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Just give me something that won't do too much damage to a human body.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Well, in that case... try a high-pressure water gun like this.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: A water gun?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Oh, it's a fairly specialized weapon. Fires high-pressure water rounds, hits hard, but won't cause major injury.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Do you know how to work a crossbow?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I've never used one in the field, but I didn't do bad on my shooting course.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Let's give it a try.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But before that, I'll explain the competition in detail.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Firstly, its formal name is the 'Dossoles Warrior Champion.'
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It takes place across the entire city. The Mayor's purchased a huge number of drones and cams, as well as low-altitude aircraft, so nobody will miss a single moment.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Not even the darkest, dankest corners of the city. Once the competition starts, we'll have drones custom-geared to follow each and every team too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And once the time hits, the TV station will split up into different main stages, making it convenient for the people to view the teams or content that they want.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: A truly loathsome level of consideration.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Ms. Candela's spared no effort in this respect.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Okay. Before the official competition was ten days of prelims, which is what you just took part in.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Every day, there've been two to three prelims held all over the city.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Were they all melees like that?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No. I don't know whether to call you lucky or unlucky, honestly. You crashed the single most dangerous kind.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: There's been a huge variety of prelim types, like eating contests, racewalks, sprints, et cetera. The scrimmage topped everything else for risk.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But the reward was just as high?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's right. No other prelim reward would've ever been as generous as the pure gold statue you got.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And that's why so many people join the scrimmage, even though it's so dangerous.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hold on, you just said the competition permits contact. Then the people who come in from the other prelims...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Aha, your reactions tell me you two are very astute.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I imagine you're worried that the competition won't be kind to entrants who won the more entertainment-focused prelims.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'll cut straight to the chase, then. No, it won't be an easy time for them.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Like I said, people want to see more than simple stamina matches. It's a fight to excite. That's why the weaker ones are up against greater threats.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: But you don't need to worry too much, Miss Ch'en. The Mayor's taken that into account. There's an article in the rules on it.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Have you noticed another problem?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The competition doesn't restrict Originium Arts. If someone could boost their own speed with it—
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: —just to exaggerate, if they could reach the goal in an instant, then that'd be tough luck to everyone else, right?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I assume people like that must exist.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How couldn't they? Even without Arts, Kuranta naturally outperform others in a race.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: They do exist, of course. To counteract that, the Mayor is giving the viewers the right to choose.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The audience decides who the true winner is?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: To be precise, the audience decides who doesn't deserve to be a winner.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: After every round of the competition, there'll be a viewer voting segment, and the votes could completely reshape the final rankings.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Using flashy means to gain victory is naturally self-explanatory.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Winning too boring might get you eliminated, but drop enough jaws and you could tip the scales when you'd otherwise fall just short.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Of course, there's no guarantee that's how it goes.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: With all of that, no one knows who the winner truly is, until the final moment.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Too boring?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Right. And not just in combat.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Dazzling fights are the most direct way to make eyes boggle, but blindsiding with actions can net you cheers too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's the rule that gives contestants a fighting chance, even if they're wipeouts in combat.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: A lesson learned from Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Right, true. I remember the Major had similar rules.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You two really have seen it all. The Mayor's visited Kazimierz several times before. Apparently, her trade agreement with Lungmen was signed there too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: So Wei Yenwu went out there as well...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: In any case, these are rules that favor the strong, so expect plenty of those who scraped through the prelims for a prize will have to forfeit at the official thing.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's why the number of teams competing always changes a little.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In short, this is a contest with no differentiation, no limits, and no holds barred on the road to victory—but—the winner needs the whole city's approval.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'm not that invested in winning or losing this.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I know that. Your goal is to use the championship to carry out your mission from Ms. Candela, right? I'll be there to help with that, too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If we lose immediately, there'll be no investigation to speak of.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Haha, that's for sure. And the two of you have probably noticed, the battle for popularity runs through the whole championship. In other words, it began the moment the preliminaries did.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And given how you entered midway into the scrimmage and stomped all over peak danger, it might not be a stretch to say your team is the hottest topic right now.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You can think of winning as a service to your goal, and enjoy what the competition has for you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We'll see. Let's talk concrete details.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Come over here. I'll explain with a map.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The competition's split into three rounds.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Round 1, you're looking for gold in an empty neighborhood.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: There are twenty bars of pure gold to find in this area, and competing teams need at least one. Hand them in to staff at the workers' area afterward, and you're through.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In a residential neighborhood?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Right. During the competition, everyone living in this area will be housed in hotels elsewhere, and the city government will cover their expenses.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: They'll cover the costs of any and all damage to housing, equipment, et cetera, as a result of the competition, too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Most look forward to it, thanks to that. There are even some dying to compete, just so they can smash their own homes up to get them rebuilt free of charge.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Find gold, fight over it, and then make for the handover. Heh, violence seems almost assured.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's right. Some choose to search, some to steal, and some to cut down on rival numbers first.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Round 1 won't end until the last of the gold is handed in to staff.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If my guess isn't wildly off, the gold is also part of the prize?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It sure is. Nothing's stopping you if you want more gold and don't actively hand it in, but you shoulder all the corresponding risk as well.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If one person acquires all the pure gold, then what?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hm... theoretically, it's possible, but practically, it's never happened before, so I'm not sure myself.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Is that what you're planning, Miss Lin?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I haven't the interest.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Once Round 1 is over, there'll be two days' downtime, where the victors are invited to take part in all sorts of spin-off events, and attend a bunch of fancy dinner parties.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Good for bolstering your popularity outside the arena, in a sense.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Then it's Round 2. You should be relatively familiar with it; it's a traditional triathlon event.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Traditional?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Traditional.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: First you run a route along the beach, then cycle a circuit around the city, and finally, return to the start at the beach for a swim, all the way until the finish: a cruise ship in the middle of the sea.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But, of course, there's all kinds of ways to win.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: During the race and cycling, I assume you're allowed to leave the main streets.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Certainly. However, the Mayor has put a substantial fighting force to block the shortcuts, so essentially, taking them means a violent breakthrough.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Heh. As expected.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: After Round 2 ends, there's two days of downtime just like Round 1, but these ones will be more of a pure rest.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The victors get the pleasure of all the entertainment and facilities aboard a cruise ship normally reserved for the rich, free of charge.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Honestly, it's the part a lot of competitors aim for when they're entering, but it's not the end of things.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Because of Round 3, the final round of the competition. Highly simple, and highly cruel.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It's a battle royale with the whole ship as fair game. Survive until you're the last team standing to be crowned winner.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Which means, in Round 3, there's practically no space for clever tricks.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Oh, right. You probably remember me saying back at the arena, team size limit is seven.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In principle, the more teammates, the more you can do.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But the more you have to split the money.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's right. And it's not like there aren't limits, too.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You aren't allowed communications equipment during the contest. That means you need to have your plan ready from the start, and if your team splinters, then you've got to be ready for them to come at you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But so long as one person completes the objective, the whole team can advance?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yes. That's why there's pros and cons to your team being big or small.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: How long until it officially starts?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Two days. These two days are downtime.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Looks like I need every last minute, then.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Head through there. You'll find a small firing range and a training ground.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Will you be fine, Miss Lin?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'll be fine. I have an Arts Unit.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Only she would switch weapons for fear of her power going out of control.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I've been putting up with you forever. I think you've been putting up with me forever. There's a training ground inside. Let's fight it out.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You're going to lose wretchedly.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Drop the braggadocio.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well... this is something.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We've landed two real wild cases.
attributes.name: Ernesto
